terms.definition: Combinations occur when consonants mix with vowels.There are twelve vowels and eighteen consonants; this results in 216 combinations
terms.description: The below decks are of the form : x+a, x+aa, x+i, x+ii, x+u, x+uu, x+e, x+ee, x+ai, x+o, x+oo, x+au
